trans-unit.source: Represents the personalization attribute.
trans-unit.target: Representa o atributo de personalização.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The personalization attribute, `Personalizable`, is applied to public control properties that need to persist personalization information.
trans-unit.target: O atributo de personalização, `Personalizable`, é aplicada às propriedades de controlo pública que precisam para manter as informações de personalização.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET automatically generates the code to persist or retrieve these values from the underlying data store when the control is in a Web Parts zone on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET gera automaticamente o código para manter ou obter estes valores do arquivo de dados subjacente, quando o controlo está numa zona peças Web numa página de peças Web.

trans-unit.source: The following requirements must be met for a property to be marked as personalizable: - The property must be public and must have public get and set accessors.
trans-unit.target: Tem de ser cumpridos os seguintes requisitos para uma propriedade ser assinalado como personalizável:-a propriedade tem de ser público e tem de ter obtenção público e definir os acessores.

trans-unit.source: - The property must be a read/write property.
trans-unit.target: -A propriedade tem de ser uma propriedade de leitura/escrita.

trans-unit.source: - The property must be without parameters.
trans-unit.target: -A propriedade tem de ser sem parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: - The property cannot be indexed.
trans-unit.target: -Não é possível indexar a propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Code is automatically generated to load and save personalization data for properties.
trans-unit.target: Código é automaticamente gerado para carregar e guardar dados de personalização de propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Properties that support personalization are determined based on the existence of this attribute on the property and the fact that the property conforms to the constraints listed above.
trans-unit.target: Propriedades que suportem a personalização são determinadas com base na existência deste atributo de propriedade e o facto de que a propriedade está em conformidade com as restrições listadas acima.

trans-unit.source: Note that read-only and write-only properties are not supported for personalization.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que não são suportadas propriedades só de leitura e só de escrita para personalização.

trans-unit.source: Applying this attribute to a read-only or write-only property results in an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> being thrown.
trans-unit.target: Aplicar este atributo para uma propriedade só de leitura ou só de escrita resulta num <xref:System.Web.HttpException>que está a ser emitida.</xref:System.Web.HttpException>

trans-unit.source: Parameterized properties also throw an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Propriedades parametrizadas também emitir um <xref:System.Web.HttpException>exceção.</xref:System.Web.HttpException>

trans-unit.source: Individual properties without this attribute are excluded from personalization if no special handling through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable> interface is used.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades individuais sem este atributo são excluídas da personalização se nenhum processamento especial através de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable>interface é utilizada.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a utilização de atributos, consulte [descrição geral de personalização de peças Web](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor internally sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A> property to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A> property to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor internamente define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>propriedade `true`, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>propriedade para <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>propriedade para `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"></xref> class using the provided parameter.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"> </xref> classe utilizando o parâmetro fornecido.

trans-unit.source: This constructor internally sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A> property to the value of the Boolean parameter, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A> property to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor internamente define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>propriedade para o valor do parâmetro booleano, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>propriedade para `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is useful if you want a derived type to mark a virtual property that is personalizable on the base type as not-personalizable on the derived type.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é útil se pretender que um tipo derivado para marcar uma propriedade virtual que é personalizável no tipo base como não personalizável no tipo derivado.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether the property can be personalized.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de Booleano indicando se a propriedade pode ser personalizada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"></xref> class using the provided parameter.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"> </xref> classe utilizando o parâmetro fornecido.

trans-unit.source: This constructor internally sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A> property to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A> property to the parameter specified, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor internamente define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>propriedade `true`, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>propriedade para o parâmetro especificado e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>propriedade para `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> indicating the scope of the personalization.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> que indica o âmbito de personalização.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"></xref> class using the provided parameters.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"> </xref> classe utilizando os parâmetros fornecidos.

trans-unit.source: This constructor internally sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A> property to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A> property to the first parameter specified, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> property to the second parameter specified.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor internamente define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>propriedade `true`, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>propriedade para o primeiro parâmetro especificado e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>propriedade para o segundo parâmetro especificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> indicating the scope of the personalization.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> que indica o âmbito de personalização.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether the property information is considered sensitive.
trans-unit.target: Valor booleano que indica se as informações de propriedade são consideradas confidenciais.

trans-unit.source: Returns an attribute instance that indicates no support for personalization.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma instância de atributo que indica a sem suporte de personalização.

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Este campo é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: This field is used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsDefaultAttribute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este campo é utilizado em conjunto com o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsDefaultAttribute%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsDefaultAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: This field and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.NotPersonalizable> field have the same value.
trans-unit.target: Este campo e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.NotPersonalizable>campo têm o mesmo valor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.NotPersonalizable>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: When overridden, returns a Boolean evaluation of the current instance of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"></xref> and another <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"></xref> instance supplied as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído, devolve uma avaliação da instância atual do booleana <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"> </xref> e outro <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"> </xref> instância fornecida como parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> instances are considered equal if their <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> property settings are the same.
trans-unit.target: Dois <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>instâncias são consideradas igual se os seus <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>definições de propriedade são iguais.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"></xref> to be compared to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"> </xref> ser comparadas para a instância atual.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the values are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os valores são iguais; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden, returns a hash code of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído, devolve um código hash do atributo.

trans-unit.source: The hash code is based on an attribute's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> property settings.
trans-unit.target: O código hash baseia-se um atributo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>definições de propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>

trans-unit.source: A hash code in the form of an integer.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash sob a forma de um número inteiro.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo> objects for the properties that match the parameter type and are marked as personalizable.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma coleção de <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>objetos para as propriedades que corresponde ao tipo de parâmetro e estão marcadas como personalizável.</xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>

trans-unit.source: This method returns a collection containing zero or more <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo> objects, with one object in the collection for each property of the type specified that is marked as being personalizable, where <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A> equals `true`.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolve uma coleção que contém zero ou mais <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>objetos, com um objeto da coleção para cada propriedade do tipo especificado que está marcado como a ser personalizável, onde <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>é igual a `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A> </xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>

trans-unit.source: The `type` parameter is the type on which to look for `Personalizable` properties.
trans-unit.target: O `type` parâmetro é do tipo em que pretende procurar `Personalizable` propriedades.

trans-unit.source: For example, you would pass in `"typeof(MyWebPart)"` to get the `Personalizable` properties on the `MyWebPart` class.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, seria passa `"typeof(MyWebPart)"` para obter o `Personalizable` propriedades no `MyWebPart` classe.

trans-unit.source: The type on which to look for <xref uid="langword_csharp_Personalizable" name="Personalizable" href=""></xref> properties.
trans-unit.target: O tipo em que pretende procurar <xref uid="langword_csharp_Personalizable" name="Personalizable" href=""> </xref> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of personalizable properties.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>das propriedades personalizável.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: A public property on the type is marked as personalizable but is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Uma propriedade pública no tipo está marcada como personalizável, é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: When overridden, returns a value that indicates whether the attribute instance equals the value of the static <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Default"></xref> field.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído, devolve um valor que indica se a instância de atributo igual ao valor de estáticos <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Default"> </xref> campo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Default> field indicates no support for personalization.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Default>campo indica sem suporte de personalização.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Default>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the attribute instance equals the static <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Default"></xref> field; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a instância de atributos for igual à estática <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Default"> </xref> campo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the setting that indicates whether the attribute can be personalized, as established by one of the constructors.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a definição que indica se o atributo pode ser personalizado, conforme estabelecido por um dos construtores.

trans-unit.source: This value is set when an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> class is created.
trans-unit.target: Este valor é definido quando uma instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>classe é criada.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property can be personalized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a propriedade pode ser personalizada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the setting that indicates whether the attribute is sensitive, as established by one of the constructors.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a definição que indica se o atributo é confidencial, conforme estabelecido por um dos construtores.

trans-unit.source: This value is set when an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> class is created.
trans-unit.target: Este valor é definido quando uma instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>classe é criada.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: This property controls how the property value is exported.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade controla a forma como o valor da propriedade é exportado.

trans-unit.source: If the property is set to `true`, it will not be exported when the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode>.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade estiver definida como `true`, não serão exportadas quando a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode> o controlo</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property is sensitive; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a propriedade é sensível; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current instance of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"></xref> and the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"></xref> have the same <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable*> property value.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se a instância atual do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"> </xref> e especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"> </xref> ter o mesmo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable*>valor da propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable*>

trans-unit.source: Use this method to match properties that have the same <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para correspondência com propriedades que têm o mesmo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>valor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"></xref> to be compared to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"> </xref> ser comparadas para a instância atual.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two attributes have the same <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable*> value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os dois atributos terem o mesmo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable*>valor; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable*>

trans-unit.source: Returns an attribute instance that indicates no support for personalization.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma instância de atributo que indica a sem suporte de personalização.

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Este campo é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: This field and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> field have the same value.
trans-unit.target: Este campo e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>campo têm o mesmo valor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Returns an attribute instance that indicates support for personalization.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma instância de atributo que indica o suporte de personalização.

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Este campo é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: This attribute instance has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A> property set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> and its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Esta instância de atributo tem respetivo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>propriedade definida como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>e a respetiva <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>propriedade definida como `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> enumeration value for the class instance, as set by one of the constructors.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> valor de enumeração para a instância de classe, conforme definido por um dos construtores.

trans-unit.source: This value is set when an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> class is created.
trans-unit.target: Este valor é definido quando uma instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>classe é criada.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: This property controls when the property value is saved and loaded, depending on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A> property of the page.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade controla quando o valor da propriedade é guardado e carregado, consoante o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A>propriedade da página.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> valor de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Returns an attribute instance that indicates support for personalization with a shared scope.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma instância de atributo que indica o suporte para personalização com um âmbito partilhado.

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Este campo é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: This attribute instance has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A> property set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> and its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Esta instância de atributo tem respetivo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>propriedade definida como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>e a respetiva <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>propriedade definida como `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Returns an attribute instance that indicates support for personalization in <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma instância de atributo que indica o suporte para personalização no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> âmbito.

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Este campo é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: This attribute instance has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A> property set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> and its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Esta instância de atributo tem respetivo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>propriedade definida como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>e a respetiva <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>propriedade definida como `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>
